snippet.title: Senile Showdown: Arthfightus (Trailer) | First Person Beat 'em Up
snippet.description:
Senile Showdown: Arthfightus was a week long, self-imposed game jam. (We needed a break from the visceral horror of Walls Closing In, aka Northbury Grove 3.) It's available for FREE on itch.io! 

Beat your way out of the old folks place / nursing home / retirement community, taking out orderlies and the unwarranted nakedness of your peers along the way!

https://scythedevteam.itch.io/senile-showdown-arthfightus

Join us on our official Discord server:
https://www.discord.gg/scythesaga

Support Scythe Dev Team & Scythe Saga Records! Links below:

https://www.scythedevteam.itch.io/
https://www.patreon.com/ScytheDevTeam
http://www.scythesaga.com
http://www.scythesaga.bandcamp.com
https://www.twitter.com/dev_scythe
